com.konakart.appif
Interface PriceFacetOptionsIf

All Known Implementing Classes:
PriceFacetOptions
public interface PriceFacetOptionsIf

Used to configure the faceting of prices when using Solr. It is an attribute of the ProductSearch object.

isCreateEmptyFacets

boolean isCreateEmptyFacets()
When set to true, empty price facets are returned. When false, the price facets returned are equivalent to those created by Solr which doesn't include empty facets. e.g. Solr will return price facets 0-20, 20-30, 30-50, 50-90 even if the size of each facet is set to 10. If it doesn't find any products in the range 0-10 it will not return that facet.

Returns:
the createEmptyFacets

setCreateEmptyFacets

void setCreateEmptyFacets(boolean createEmptyFacets)
When set to true, empty price facets are returned. When false, the price facets returned are equivalent to those created by Solr which doesn't include empty facets. e.g. Solr will return price facets 0-20, 20-30, 30-50, 50-90 even if the size of each facet is set to 10. If it doesn't find any products in the range 0-10 it will not return that facet.

Parameters:
createEmptyFacets - the createEmptyFacets to set
